regional_addizionale_irpef_avg.label: Average regional IRPEF addizionale (approx.)
regional_addizionale_irpef_avg.notes: Aggregated approximation of regional addizionale IRPEF; region-specific variation not modelled.

disclaimers: Italy model is a simplified Tier 2 implementation: IRPEF 3-bracket schedule only; municipal addizionale and special regimes are not modelled.
INPS and other social contributions are aggregated into a single pension contribution with flat employee and employer rates; detailed sector/contract variations and contribution ceilings are omitted.
Employment tax relief (detrazioni per lavoro dipendente) is approximated via a single flat allowance; actual payslips may differ, especially at very low or very high incomes.
Model is intended for standard full-time employment between roughly 1,200 € and 7,000 € gross per month; outside this band, accuracy may degrade.
notes: IRPEF brackets and rates follow the 3-bracket schedule (23% / 35% / 43%) introduced from tax year 2024 onwards and treated as stable for 2026 use.
Regional addizionale is represented by a single average rate to preserve simplicity; use external calculators for region-specific comparisons.
Contributions are computed on gross salary only; benefits, fringe income, and special regimes (e.g. forfeitari, bonuses) are out of scope.
